ygData.subject: Re: strength
ygData.msgSnippet: Strength adds to the attack roll, which helps determine how often max damage is dealt with a chosen weapon. Anyone who can weild a specific weapon will do the
ygData.messageBody:
Strength adds to the attack roll, which helps determine how often max
damage is dealt with a chosen weapon.
Anyone who can weild a specific weapon will do the same amount of max
damage. But how often that happens is partially determined by strength.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule

--- "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...> wrote:
> Okie, my wife is an ogre, level 18 sk...
> What good is the strength? The DE hit just as hard
> as she does...
> How about all that stamina? The DE have just as many
> hitpoints?
> Ermm, anyone know whats up with this? Is the 150 str
> good just for carrying loot?
> Morgul
>
